pages.text: The perilous $(item)Soul Alloy Pickaxe$() is worth more than your average and puny $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$(). By right-clicking you can send out a beam which vein mines any ores it touches. Applying the various $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$() on your $(item)Soul Alloy Pickaxe$() will affect it in these various ways:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the pace when you are mining with the pickaxe. Stacks with efficiency.$()$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Increases the amount dropped by certain ores. Stacks with fortune.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Literally increases the scope of where you mine. Increases by 1 block per gem.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability when using the tool. Stacks with unbreaking.
